name: Caution Ahead: Part 1
storyline: You follow the story of John Rand, an experienced search and rescue officer stationed at Richburg National Park. John is part of a broader search and rescue team tasked with finding the missing girl, Elena Peterson. Elena went missing while on a hiking trip with her parents. During the search and rescue operation, John finds himself isolated from the rest of the team and attempts to retrace his steps.
summary:
This is the first installment of a three-part series featuring a hide-and-seek type horror experience, with each part consisting of three chapters.

John Rand, a search and rescue officer stationed at Richburg National Park, finds himself isolated from the rest of the search party looking for the missing girl Elena. Uncover the dark secrets lurking within the shadows of Richburg National Park in this three part series.
